name: Fasty
author: CIS

sections.description:
Make use of our plugin which is specifically built to optimize load speed of the site while increasing conversions up to 3X.
No changes are made on your website, our code works in the background to improve the network communication layer.

  • Best-in-class Interface: With just a single app, you can enhance the interface of your platform.
  • No additional CDN or developer required.
  • Positive TTFB (time to the first byte) impact.
  • Improved speed of apps, tablet, mobile, and desktop.
  • Increased SEO Speed.
  • Improve Conversion Rate: Improving site performance can significantly improve the conversion rate of the website. A fast loading website means happier customers with speedy checkout who don’t go to visit your competitors!
  • Monitor Site Speed Improvements: Helps in Onload loading time in seconds. It makes it easy to monitor changes and improve your site performance.
  • Expert Support: Our expert is always available to deliver you timely support whenever you need it.

Here are the key features:

  • No coding needed: There is no coding required, even the store owner can enable the plugin.
  • Compatible: Our plugin works the best with full-page CDN.
  • No developer help required: As there’s is no need for coding, thus it is not required to hire a developer. If you need any help, we are here for you anytime.
  • Positive TTFB (time to the first byte) impact: It offers a positive TTFB impact on your website.
  • Page speed: It helps with improved page speed of desktop mobile and tablet.
  • SEO Speed-Up: SEO speed optimization can also be done with this plugin.
  • Optimization on TCP/ Network Layer: And the last but not least, optimization is done on the network.TCP layer.

PRO

The Fasty plugin is also available in a Pro version which includes more functionality
